short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrobbles tracks from various sites to your Maloja server

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submits metadata about the music you play on Plex Web, Spotify, Bandcamp, YouTube Music and Soundcloud to your personal Maloja server in order to create personal listening statistics.
